definition: (of siblings) having the same mother but different fathers/half (brother or sister)

sentences.english: Do you still live with you half-brother?
sentences.chinese: 你還和你同母異父弟弟住在一起？

sentences.english: S: Do you still live with you half-brother?
sentences.chinese: 你還和你同母異父弟弟住在一起？

sentences.english: Do you yet live dawn you half-brotIT?
sentences.chinese: 你還和你同母異父弟弟住在一起？
我同母異父的姊妹是個護士。

sentences.english: He had an Indonesian stepfather and half-sister.
sentences.chinese: 他有一個印度尼西亞繼父和一個同母異父的妹妹。
